In case if you receive blank invoice (with AP amount only) you should made an investigation\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Parking of Bank Statements (payments from EPAM bank account) is performed through ZEDMS transaction in SAP. While parking payment from bank account the next fields must be obligatory filled-in: date of bank statement, payment Company code, bank name, CTC ID, currency, short summary, APP/ GLP payment type and Vendor name\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Processes of Vendor clearing and Vendor open items checking in general are performed altogether.
